name: Solitaire ⋆ The Best Card Game
description:
Enjoy this fantastic FREE SOLITAIRE (or Klondike Solitaire - Patience) card game on your iPhone or iPad.

This Classic Solitaire is the most popular version of the card game in the world. Enjoy our Best Free Solitaire card app. It is easy, fun and much cooler to play than the old Windows Solitaire or any variation you might find.

Features :
- Simple and beautiful graphics
- Draw 1 card
- Draw 3 cards
- Undo
- Unlimited Hints
- Unlimited Joker
- Klondike gameplay
- Vegas score available
- iPhone and iPad optimized
- Auto-complete for solved games
- Custom Backgrounds
- Custom Card backs
- Sound on/off
- Auto-save and resume when you are back
- Crisp clear easy to read cards
- Statistics in the settings area
- Move cards by taping or dragging.

Play the best Solitaire game RIGHT NOW !
